channel.title: Runes & Monster Drops

item.title: Re: Runes & Monster Drops
item.content:encoded:
I'm looking for a Power over 9000 and am willing to trade one of the following Kaiju Items for it:

Big Mouth

Carapace Armor
Catgirl Entourage
Claw Card

Magical Wand
Pokerballs
Red Water
Troll Account
